statements: SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE amount > 1000.00
SELECT category, amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT id, transaction_date, category FROM monthly_expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE amount < 500.00 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, category, amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-02-01'
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM monthly_expenses GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM monthly_expenses GROUP BY category HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_date, category, amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY id ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT category, amount FROM transaction_data WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT date, description FROM transaction_data WHERE category = 'Utilities' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, category FROM monthly_expenses WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, category, amount FROM monthly_expenses WHERE category = 'Groceries'
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM monthly_expenses GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, date, description FROM transaction_data WHERE date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transaction_data GROUP BY category HAVING avg_amount > 50
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE transaction_date = '2021-05-20'
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT expense_id, category_id FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, category FROM expenses WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT c.category_name, SUM(e.amount) FROM categories c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.id = t.category_id INNER JOIN expenses e ON t.expense_id = e.id GROUP BY c.category_name ORDER BY SUM(e.amount) DESC;
SELECT e.id, e.amount, c.category_name FROM expenses e JOIN transactions t ON e.id = t.expense_id JOIN categories c ON t.category_id = c.id ORDER BY e.amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS largest_amount FROM expenses;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM expenses ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, amount, category FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT users.username, expenses.amount, categories.category_name FROM users JOIN expenses ON users.user_id = expenses.id JOIN categories ON expenses.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE users.username = 'John' AND category_name = 'Groceries';

SELECT transactions.transaction_id, expenses.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM transactions JOIN expenses ON transactions.expense_id = expenses.id WHERE transactions.amount > 500 ORDER BY transactions.transaction_date ASC;

SELECT expenses.id, expenses.amount, categories.category_name FROM expenses JOIN categories ON expenses.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE expenses.amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY expenses.id ASC, category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, category_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT description, total_expenses FROM transactions t JOIN monthly_expenses m ON t.transaction_id = m.total_expenses
